DialogWillCloseOnSaveOfNewMarker: This dialog will close as soon the new object was saved or the window is closed. If the object was saved a new marker will be inserted.
Name: Name
YouAreEditingANonDefaultChapter: You are currently not changing the default chapter. All changes are only valid from the current chapter onwards.
DrawDragToDrawCircle: Click and drag to draw circle.
DrawClickToStartShape: Click to start drawing the shape.
DrawClickToContinueShape: Click to continue drawing this shape.
DrawClickFirstPointToEndShape: Click first point to close this shape.
DrawClickToStartLine: Click to start drawing the line.
DrawClickToContinueLine: Click to continue drawing this line.
DrawClickLastPointToEndLine: Click last point to finish this line.
DrawDragToDrawRectangle: Click and drag to draw circle.
